General.Name: Jiangsu Cai Qin Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Cai Qin Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of microwave dielectric ceramic components in China and internationally. It produces ceramic dielectric filters, dielectric waveguide filters, dielectric resonators, cavity filters, and antennas, as well as duplexers. The company offers its products to mobile communications, satellite communications, satellite, navigation and positioning, aerospace, electronic devices, automotive industry, internet of everything, and other fields. Jiangsu Cai Qin Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in JiangSu, China.
